title: ChatGPT for Code Engineers: Best Practices and Considerations

courseOutline.title: ChatGPT for Code Engineers: Best Practices and Considerations
courseOutline.description: This course is designed to equip experienced code engineers with the knowledge and skills needed to effectively integrate ChatGPT into their projects, understand its limitations, and ensure security.
courseOutline.goal: Enable code engineers to effectively determine appropriate scenarios for using ChatGPT in their work, while recognizing limitations and potential risks.
courseOutline.audience: Experienced code engineers seeking to enhance their understanding of AI tools like ChatGPT.

sections.title: Overview of ChatGPT
sections.description: An introduction to the capabilities and features of ChatGPT.

sections.title: ChatGPT in Code Engineering Projects
sections.description: Understanding how ChatGPT can be applied within code engineering projects.

sections.title: API Integration
sections.description: Exploring methods to integrate ChatGPT through API calls into existing systems.

sections.title: SDKs and Libraries
sections.description: Using SDKs and libraries for more seamless integration of ChatGPT functionalities.

sections.title: Common Pitfalls
sections.description: Identifying common issues and limitations when using ChatGPT in code engineering projects.

sections.title: Performance Considerations
sections.description: Discussing performance-related constraints of integrating ChatGPT into applications.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.description: Ensuring data security while using ChatGPT, including handling sensitive information.

sections.title: Ethical Considerations
sections.description: Addressing ethical concerns related to the use of AI in code engineering projects.
